page.title: 01LANDSCAPE
page.content: WORCESTER. Worcester is a city in the West Midlands with a population of some 70,000 people. It is sited on the River Severn and there has been a settlement here for over 2,000 years. Our block is situated in the Southern part stretching from just West of the River Severn to the Eastern outskirts and southwards to include Whittington village and several farms. There is a variety of landcover from the commerce of shops, banks,estate agents,hotels etc. in the middle of the city to the residential areas and through to the open land in the South.The houses vary in age from some ninety years old to present day. Additionally there is a range of Industry making porcelain, metal goods, clothes, sauce making and printing. The Worcester-Droitwich canal with its locks runs through the block from South to North.
